extendedInfo.description: A free personalized city guide covering 30+ different categories essential for residents or visitors looking for great city experiences in Chicago. *** Over 5M users have used MyCityWay to guide their city experiences****** Number 1 iTunes Travel App (Vegas Way) & Top 5 Travel App by news media***Key Features include access to valuable information about:Dining/RestaurantsTransit News and AlertsWi-Fi Hot SpotsNightlife - Bars, Clubs, Comedy, Music and DancingCoffee ShopsRestroom LocatorHotelsShoppingToursParkingArt Galleries and MuseumsTheaters - showsGas StationsTransit MapsTrain/Rail Locations and Arrival TimesOutdoor and Indoor Recreation - Beaches, Zoos, Aquariums, Parks, Bowling, Yoga, Hiking, Pools, Libraries, Tennis Courts, PlaygroundsEvents across multiple categoriesChildren's ActivitiesBeauty and SpaPost Office, UPS and Fedex locationsApartments to rent and for saleGrocery storesPharmaciesCreate lists of your favorite spots and share with your family and friendsand so much moreEnjoy instant access to everything that's happening around you in Chicago, with just a simple tap on your iPhone get to the information you need for a great city experience, based on location.You have everything you need in your city in one single easy-to-use app. Get around better, faster and smarter. Free to download now, with offline access to important information like bus and rail maps.What people are saying about MyCityWay:"â¦ maybe this is the future of apps? One button leads to a dozen rich choices â¦" Tboomer" I generally never write reviews for apps but this blew me away today â¦ this is GOLD!" ifrowned"everyone in â¦ need this. It's incredible how many useful features this single app has." mcrobotAnd check out the newest all in one real time app from "MyCityWay" - over 40 cities now in the one app with a great new design and easy access to even more information to plan your city experience

reviews.title: It is good .
reviews.comment: It is good. But how do u put things in your favorite . And it freeze a lot. And the news do not come up . But other thing that it is OK.

reviews.title: Can\'t move to SD

reviews.comment: Is now ridiculously slow, takes up more space than any other app on my phone, can\'t move to SD, half the links don\'t work.  Could be awesome but isn\'t

reviews.title: Great app with tons of features!
reviews.comment: My favorite app for my favorite city. But where are the live traffic cams they mention in the description?

reviews.title: Wow -
reviews.comment: Your update goes from about 8mb to 23mb w/o being able to move to sd card? No thanks.

reviews.comment: This has to be one of the best apps I have ever run across. It covers all aspects of Chicago for a visitor.

reviews.comment: This app has great promise but many bugs. Locks up alot. Not deleting- I\'m hoping for some fixes to come about soon.

reviews.title: Missing information
reviews.comment: Has outdated info and does not list businesses that have been around for years. Developer not responsive when given updated info.

reviews.comment: My favorite app of all time! Offers so much and is perfect! Everything Chicago at your fingertips. Would like to see Yelp reviews for restaurants.

reviews.comment: Awkward searches... You have \"Ethiopian\" when searching cuisine type but not \"Polish\"? You\'ve got to be kidding me. This is Chicago...
